title: (x) Mercy High School flare serif - Friz Quadrata {Patricia}
content:
I apologize for the quality of this snapshot, but does anyone recognize the font used for Mercy?

Thanks——-Natalieboh

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Mercy_4529.jpg)
author: natalieboh

comments.content:
Holy cow! It was around 9:30 at night here in Maryland and I figured I would check in the morning. Thanks for the ID.

Natalieboh

We are on call 24/7 for all your type emergencies.

Satya, IDs have been made in a minute or less

<cite>Satya, IDs have been made in a minute or less</cite>

patty, i know that. Its depends on when you first read the thread. One should start counting from that time.  
:)

\> _Satya, IDs have been made in a minute or less_

[**No. 6**](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104336/http:/typophile.com/node/29019) — Even though they do a far better job than men, they are gracious enough to praise them for their achievements.
with me it’s all a function of how busy I am - or how badly I want to procrastinate.

[**No. 6** bis](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104336/http:/typophile.com/node/29019) — Even though they do a far better job than men, they are gracious enough to belittle their own achievements. :-D
